alert.note: Alert for McDowell (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 12:29PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Buchanan and western McDowell Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1228 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grundy, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grundy, Paw Paw, Gilbert Creek, Bradshaw, Iaeger, Stacy, Panther, Vansant, Hurley, Jolo and Roseann. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
